content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Nesibe, it was nice to meet you. Thank you for coming to see the apartment. Based on our discussion, I would like to propose a rental price of $1,500 per month. This price takes into account the size and location of the apartment, as well as the current market rates in the area. Is this price acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 250 Euro per month. Thank you for your offer.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: I'm glad to hear that you agree to the rental price of 250 Euro per month. Thank you for choosing to rent my apartment. If you have any questions or concerns during your tenancy, please don't hesitate to reach out to me. I look forward to hearing from you soon.
name: Heinrich Heine
